name: SCP Containment Breach
description:
SCP Containment Breach is an indie game in the genre of survival horror, in which you will have to try and survive and escape from the SCP (Secure. Contain. Protect.) Organization.

According to the plot of the game, an accident occurs in the complex, and some SCP objects escape. In the game, the rooms are random, that is, if you die and start a new game, the rooms will be different from the last one, which adds replay.


We wish you a pleasant game in SCP Containment Breach game
